name: Lucrecia

specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description: The lamia matriarch can take on the appearance of a Medium humanoid. This doesn’t change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it does prevent them from using their cursed touch. Each lamia matriarch has a fixed humanoid form—they cannot adopt a different appearance each time they use this ability, and the appearance resembles that of their upper torso when in their true form.

specials.name: Dervish Strike
specials.description: The lamia matriarch makes an attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy she damages is subject to matriarch’s caress.

specials.name: Matriarch's Caress
specials.description: The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a DC 31 Will save or become stupefied 1 (stupefied 2 if critically failed). If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 if failed or 2 if critically failed (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

specials.name: Constrictor tail
specials.description: Trigger: A creature within 5 ft. critically fails an Athletics check or melee strike. Effect: Lucrecia attempts an Athletics check to grapple the creature with her tail, needing no free hands.

specials.name: Constrict
specials.description:
Requirements Lucrecia has a smaller creature grabbed. 
Lucrecia deals 24 bludgeoning damage to the grabbed creature; the creature must attempt a basic Fortitude save.

specials.name: Magic Tattoo
specials.description:
Frequency: once per day
The next spontaneous spell Lucrecia casts undergoes the effects of the Silent Spell and Conceal Spell metamagic feats.
